official_title: Using Rural Community Paramedicine to Engage Lower-Motivated Smokers: Spreading an Effective mHealth-Assisted Intervention to Motivate Cessation
inclusion_criteria:
* Current Smoker
* at least 18 years old
* speaks English
* Able to receive texts and read text (literate)
* Have a text-enabled phone or receive one from the study team
* Not yet ready to quit smoking
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* actively quitting smoking
* preparing to quit smoking within 30 days
* prisoners
* FDA- defined NRT contraindications
* unable or unwilling to provide informed consent
